Html:
I was curious so I downloaded the source and modified it to work on Windows Azure.  If there's enough interest, I can post a blog on the differences.

http://nerddinner.cloudapp.net/

FYI - I think I already found a bug, but it's a small one :-)

Fantastic! I'd love to see a blog post and source.
